about.title: About
about.subtitle: A bit about myself
about.content: Front-End Developer specializing in TypeScript and modern JavaScript frameworks, with solid experience building scalable web and mobile applications using React, React Native, Next.js, and Vue.js. Experienced in creating high-performance interfaces, implementing responsive and accessible user interfaces, and collaborating effectively within agile, cross-functional teams. Strong focus on clean architecture, maintainable code, and delivering user-centered digital experiences.
about.sentence: Living, learning & leveling up one day at a time

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: My Projects Collection
projects.instruction: Press access to visit the project page or the GitHub Icon to access the project in my repository.

weatherApp.title: Weather App
weatherApp.description: Utilization of API to provide real-time weather information.

pomodoroTimer.title: Pomodoro Timer
pomodoroTimer.description: Pomodoro Timer application that assists in time management and productivity enhancement.

toggleThemeMui.title: Toggle Theme - MUI
toggleThemeMui.description: The Toggle Theme MUI project allows you to switch between light and dark themes in a web application.

feed.title: Feed
feed.description: Simulates a feed system, allowing the display of organized and interactive posts and comments.

toDoList.title: ToDo List
toDoList.description: Task list application, allowing users to create, organize, and manage their tasks efficiently and conveniently.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: The project provides a calculator with both normal and scientific modes, featuring an intuitive interface.

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: The project incorporates e-commerce features, facilitating order processing and payment transactions.

coffeeShop.title: Coffee Shop
coffeeShop.description: The project includes caf√©-related features, making it easy to handle orders and process payments efficiently.

gymMobileApp.title: Gym - Mobile
gymMobileApp.description: Training app prototyped in Figma and developed with React Native.

gymApi.title: Gym - API
gymApi.description: API for the training app, developed in Node.js, using Prisma and Docker.

gymPassSystem.title: GymPass System
gymPassSystem.description: API developed in Node.js, using Prisma and Docker.

findAFriend.title: Find a Friend
findAFriend.description: API for an animal search system, developed in Node.js, using Prisma and Docker.

dailyDietApi.title: Daily Diet
